name: Mitigation Playbook for Unauthorized Script Execution
description: This playbook addresses an incident where an unauthorized script executed on host-22, dropping malicious files and establishing backdoor access.

action--a3aa4f8e-88d7-4b2e-b6a4-6b3135f9.name: Terminate unauthorized script process
action--a3aa4f8e-88d7-4b2e-b6a4-6b3135f9.description: Terminate any unauthorized script processes running on host-22.

action--fb217749-5369-4f3e-a2e4-5a764c10.name: Block suspicious outbound network connectivity
action--fb217749-5369-4f3e-a2e4-5a764c10.description: Block any suspicious outbound network connections.

action--c57dc41f-8f56-4a8c-9d77-48866eff.name: Scan and quarantine detected backdoor
action--c57dc41f-8f56-4a8c-9d77-48866eff.description: If malware is found, scan and quarantine the malicious backdoor file.

action--e01c47e6-03f7-49b5-932f-2cc6af61.name: Revert system files from backup
action--e01c47e6-03f7-49b5-932f-2cc6af61.description: Revert the system files from backup if integrity check failed.

action--c8bfa757-bcdd-4205-8966-af2aba3f.name: Repeat virus scan until clean
action--c8bfa757-bcdd-4205-8966-af2aba3f.description: Continue scanning the system until no viruses are detected.

action--f0b7a464-c081-490a-982e-d5bf5957.name: Inform IT Security Team
action--f0b7a464-c081-490a-982e-d5bf5957.description: Notify the IT Security team about the incident.

commands.command: echo 'Security incident detected on host-22' | mail -s 'Security Alert' it_sec_team@example.com

malware_found.description: Indicates whether malicious files were detected during the scan.

virus_detected.description: Indicates whether any viruses were detected.

file_integrity_check_failed.description: Indicates whether the file integrity check has failed.
